results.title: The Clown of God (K)
results.creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel, Ernest Troost and Gary McGivney
results.brief_description: A beautifully filmed adaptation of the Tomi de Paola story about Giovanni, the clown who juggled for a living during the Middle Ages. Now, old and penniless, he returns to his birthplace seeking refuge in the church on Christmas Eve. Watching the procession of gifts for the Holy Child, he offers the only gift he has - one last performance. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.

results.title: The Cline Affair (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Brings into sharp focus the difficult ethical and moral questions surrounding the burgeoning field of genetic manipulation. The intrigue which cloaked the affair is investigated and the uncertain future of gene therapy is examined

results.title: The Clay circus
results.creator_credit: Texture Films and Herman J. Engel
results.brief_description: Captures, without narration, the spirit of the circus. A clay sculpture, by Shay Rieger, inspired by the color, forms, and motions of the circus, are intercut with segments of actual circus acts.

results.title: The Classroom
results.creator_credit: Patrick Ryan, Eltham Films and Tim Burstall
results.brief_description: Puppet film for children. Sebastian the Fox appears in a typical classroom with children playing pranks on their master as well as on each other. As so often happens the innocent are punished, in this case Sebastian. The offenders are eventually caught and receive their just desserts.

results.title: The Classic guitar: a miniature orchestra
results.creator_credit: Nina Collier, Lee R. Bobker, Arts and Audiences and Dynamic Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Music for Young People”.
Discusses and demonstrates the use of the versatility of the guitar and explains how colour and other effects are produced. Features Rey de la Torre.

results.title: The Claim
results.brief_description: About some of the processes of industrial negotiations. The progress of a log of claims is followed from its inception in the work place through its many stages of direct negotiations with the employer or through the process of conciliation and arbitration.

results.title: The City with a future
results.creator_credit: Robert Dierbeck and United Nations Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Man builds - man destroys”.
Examines two aspects of environmental city planning. Although Disney-World, Florida, is not a real city, the Disney planners have come up with some surprising technological solutions to urban problems. The film also shows how the citizens of Toronto have shown that it is possible to change the pattern of urban growth and make a city liveable again.

results.title: The city that waits to die
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: An alert from scientists concerned with a catastrophic fate for San Francisco based on earthquake conditions presented by the San Andreas fault. Includes scenes of earthquakes and describes some of the radical experiments being conducted in starting and stopping earthquakes.
results.description: SUMMARY: An alert from scientists concerned with a catastrophic fate for San Francisco based on earthquake conditions presented by the San Andreas fault.
